Package finalproject

The finalproject package contains all classes required for both the backend and frontend implementation of the virtual store.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Administrator
    Represents an Administrator user that exists in the Store's database.
    Category
    Represents a Category that products may belong to.
    City
    Represents a single city in the graph.
    DBManager
    Class dedicated to reading and writing to the CSV file that stores all data for the store.
    Graph
    Graph is a class that handles information about all the cities in one simulation.
    Invoice
    Represents an invoice for a successfully placed order by a shopper in the store.
    Product
    Represents a product in the store.
    Project
    This class is intended to be your API
    ProjectV1
    Extended API for phase 3
    ShopApp
    This class implements the GUI interface that connects to the Store back end and CSV files.
    Shopper
    Represents a Shopper user that exists in the Store's database.
    ShoppingApp
    Test class / main method to run GUI application.
    Store
    The central hub for everything in this package.
    User
    Superclass to both Administrator and Shopper.

Package finalproject Description

The finalproject package contains all classes required for both the backend and frontend implementation of the virtual store. It includes all user types, as well as classes for product, invoice, graph (the cities and their connections), as well as the central hub Store.java, the database reader/writer DBManager, and the GUI manager ShopApp.
Author:
group_0557
